GPUComputePipeline.summary: The GPUComputePipeline interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents a pipeline that controls the compute shader stage and can be used in a .

remarks.para: A GPUComputePipeline object instance can be created using the or methods.

GPUComputePipelineGetBindGroupLayout.summary:
The getBindGroupLayout() method of the
interface returns the pipeline's object with the given index (i.e., included in the originating or call's pipeline layout).

remarks.para: If the was created with layout: "auto", this method is the only way to retrieve the s generated by the pipeline.

GPUComputePipelineLabel.summary:
The label property of the
interface provides a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating or call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUComputePipeline object.

GPUComputePipelineLabel.value: A string. If this has not been previously set as described above, it will be an empty string.
